text: Kentucky's 2nd congressional district is a congressional district in the U.S. state of Kentucky. The district is in the middle part of the state. The cities in the district are Bowling Green, Owensboro, and Elizabethtown. The people who live in the district elect a person to represent the district in the United States House of Representatives. The district is currently represented by Republican Brett Guthrie. In the district no incumbent representative has lost an election since 1884. ==Election history== ===2002=== ===2004=== ===2006=== ===2008=== ===2010=== ===2012=== ===2014=== ===2016=== ===2018=== ===2020=== ==References== 02
